languages.text: "Мне жаль, что ваш дом был разрушен. Но я не был{mf||а} там и ничего не знаю об этой беде".
"I'm sorry to hear that your home was destroyed. But I wasn't there and know nothing of this calamity."
languages.original_text: "Мне жаль, что ваш дом был разрушен. Но я не был{mf||а} там и ничего не знаю об этой беде".

traits.locale_text: "I'm sorry to hear that your home was destroyed. But I wasn't there and know nothing of this calamity."
"I'm sorry to hear that your home was destroyed. But I wasn't there and know nothing of this calamity."
"I'm sorry to hear that your home was destroyed. But I wasn't there and know nothing of this calamity."
"I'm sorry to hear that your home was destroyed. But I wasn't there and know nothing of this calamity."
"I'm sorry to hear that your home was destroyed. But I wasn't there and know nothing of this calamity."

languages.text: “你的家园被摧毁了，我对此很遗憾。不过我当时不在场，对这场灾难也一无所知。”
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry to hear that your home was destroyed. But I wasn't there and know nothing of this calamity."

traits.locale_text: “你的家园被摧毁了，我对此很遗憾。不过我当时不在场，对这场灾难也一无所知。”

languages.text: 「家族が殺害されたことは気の毒に思う。だが、{mf|俺|私}はその場にはいなかったし、その苦悩について知るべくもない」
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry to hear that your home was destroyed. But I wasn't there and know nothing of this calamity."

traits.locale_text: 「家族が殺害されたことは気の毒に思う。だが、{mf|俺|私}はその場にはいなかったし、その苦悩について知るべくもない」

languages.text: "Es tut mir leid, zu hören, dass Eure Heimat zerstört wurde. Aber ich war nicht dabei und weiß nichts von dieser Katastrophe."
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry to hear that your home was destroyed. But I wasn't there and know nothing of this calamity."

traits.locale_text: "Es tut mir leid, zu hören, dass Eure Heimat zerstört wurde. Aber ich war nicht dabei und weiß nichts von dieser Katastrophe."

languages.text: « Je suis {mf|navré|navrée} d'apprendre que votre monde a été détruit, mais je n'ai rien à voir avec cette calamité. »
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry to hear that your home was destroyed. But I wasn't there and know nothing of this calamity."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis {mf|navré|navrée} d'apprendre que votre monde a été détruit, mais je n'ai rien à voir avec cette calamité. »

languages.text: «Lamento la destrucción de vuestro hogar, pero yo no estuve allí y no sé nada de esa calamidad».
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry to hear that your home was destroyed. But I wasn't there and know nothing of this calamity."

traits.locale_text: «Lamento la destrucción de vuestro hogar, pero yo no estuve allí y no sé nada de esa calamidad».

languages.text: "Yurdunuzun yok edilmesine üzüldüm. Gelgelelim şahsen orada değildim, yaşanan felaketten haberim yok."
languages.original_text: "I'm sorry to hear that your home was destroyed. But I wasn't there and know nothing of this calamity."

traits.locale_text: "Yurdunuzun yok edilmesine üzüldüm. Gelgelelim şahsen orada değildim, yaşanan felaketten haberim yok."
